Name:
HMS Zodiac
INS Yaffo
Identification:
Pennant number: R54 initially, but changed to D54 in 1945
Pennant number: K-42
Badge: On a Field Blue, a bezant rayed Gold on each point a bezant charged with the zodiac signs Black
Propulsion:
Geared turbines
two shafts
40,000 hp (30 MW)
Armament:
4 х 4.5 inch guns
5 х 40 mm guns
8 х Torpedo tubes
